Ruth White

  1. Foster Name: Ruth E.
  2. Foster Family: Harvy A. and Katherine M. Hershberger
  3. Location of Family: Seward, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Seward, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 7
  7. Date of Birth: 1909, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1990-02-02, San Mateo, CA
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Ruth Baack
  11. Spouse Name: Leonard Buack
  12. Source: The Blue Valley Blade, 2 February 1916; 1920 United States Federal Census; Find-A-Grave for Ruth H. Baack; Find-A-Grave for Alvenna "Verna" White Vaphides; Roger Weaver Corres.
